lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hm... My food budget is really diving into the red zone again. I better find a new case soon.
*knock knock*

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Perfect timing!)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hello! Welcome! Come on in to the Enloade Detective Agency!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: How may I help you on this lovely day?

lines.name: Client
lines.text: Enloade? This isn't Keyna from OASCI? Well, I guess you'll have to do.

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: I go by Earl Leebird, but you can call me Earl. I need you to help me find something very important!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...I'm going to pretend you didn't just mention the name of my arch nemesis and get now to business.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What are you looking for sir?

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: WELL. I was heading home from ordinary day of work, stopping by my usual favorite bakery for a chocolate cake.

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: But then, what do you know? Right when I was heading out, some delinquent crow attacked me!

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: When the feathers cleared, my precious ring was gone!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And the cake? What happened to the cake?!

lines.name: Earl Leebird
lines.text: Oh the cake was safe. And I ate it of course.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...Then what do you want me to find?

lines.name: Earl
lines.text: Clearly I want you to find my ring! My word, are you really a detective?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (God, all this blabbering about cake is making my poor stomach wail. When's the last time I even had cake? And he said it was chocolate-

lines.name: Earl
lines.text: THE RING!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I heard you the first time!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Are you sure t t
